version_description: Game ended screen reworked and additional statistics/graphs added also. Mini overview map can now be open/closed and allows to change province shading. Team games now have dipomacy/elections enabled again by default. Administration cost updated. Please read the guide for details. Rankings table also shows clans if any. Translations updated & other bugfixes/minor changes.

New Maps: "Feudal Japan" (Sengoku Period) and "Japan and Korea". AI Balancing: weaker on lower levels. Team Games: diplomacy disabled by default but can be enabled as needed. GUI fixes: top part now clickable. Lastest Translations added. Misc. Bugfixes (incl. for crashes).

Map downloads can now be rated, sorted and searched. Random games (single player) allow difficulty & objective selection. Chat broadcasts show active turn also. Provinces can be sorted by happiness or population size. Translations updated. Misc. other changes incl. bugfixes for crashes.
Bugfix for crashes & freezes.

End Game Statistics updated with additional information. Progress statistics improved with graph (rather than text). Protectorate stripes in color of protector. Clan profile has a join button also. Latest translations added. Misc. other updates & bugfixes for crashes/freezes.

Village sizes now proportional to population. Ratings updated for multiplayer featuring separate ratings for fast and slow games including team games. Friend and other player online stati displayed with a blue ring. Guide updated with more information. Translations updated. Game play bugfixes and more.

Game setup allows setting additional custom start parameter, e.g. everyone at a 3-turn cease fire when the game starts. For multiplayer, the joinable games list now contains abbreviations for the game modes the various games feature. Disjoining rated games is now disabled. Bugfixes for fast "Blitz" games with improved client-server networking to not drop inputted actions as easily anymore. Bugfixes for scrolling (stopped working) and other minor. misc. bugfixes/updates.

Incognito Mode: games can now played anonymously by setting the "Incognito Mode" checkbox during game setup! Balancing: a transaction fee of -25% is assessed for transfer of funds from one nation to the other. UI and font update. Misc. fixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Intensity of new in-game UI reduced (not as bright). Sorry for that!

UI improvements for layout/coloring. Update for networking, i.e. fast multiplayer games should run smoother. Balancing: transaction fee for given gold reduced to 10%, also option to disable transactions. Update for clan settings; mark as closed for joining. Misc. minor updates, bugfixes and bugfixes for crashes.
Bugfix for loading large maps on older devices, e.g. iPhone 5s. Graphics memory usage improved.

GUI reworked and streamlined (less clutter), especially the user-related popups. Statistics added showing (a) countries and (b) languages for the players. Latest translations added. Misc. other improvements including bugfixes for crashes.

GUI overhauled. You can now play in portrait mode also (not just landscape). Incognito games for multiplayer more incognito. Input slider is now disabled by default but can be re-enabled in the game's settings if desired. Minor bugfix for AI & inquiries tab gone if not used. Misc. bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Maintenance Release: bugfixes, including bugfixes for crashes & latest translations.

AI messaging added, i.e. players can send messages to the AI. Custom clan member ranks, i.e. each clan member can have it's own title been given. Shortcut buttons for festivals in the province listing tab. Improved errors loading large map, i.e. memory footprint reduced. Latest translations added. Misc. other minor fixes, improvements, including bugfixes for crashes.
Maintenance release with misc. bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.

Font updated to make it smoother and also slightly increased size. Performance updated, i.e. rendering should now be faster. Networking now fully supports IPv6 (server). Fixed some GUI alignments. Latest translations added. Bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Fixes for font/text issues incl. some minor UI updates for portrait/landscape orientation. Also fixed some potential crashes.
Incognito games now also hide game owner. Minor UI and tutorial improvements. Latest translations. Misc. bugfixes and updates including bugfixes for crashes.

Diplomacy exploit fixed gaining happiness without penalty. Manual updated to correctly explain combat math. Server updated to fully support IPv6 incl. other. Auto-translations for chat improved. Misc. fixes including bugfixes for crashes.

Support for custom nation names. GUI improvements. Tuned multiplayer for fair play (better checks). Download speeds improved. Latest translations added. Performance and memory improvements. Misc. bugfixes and updates including bugfixes for crashes.

Misc. GUI improvements. Update for networking I/O to improve stability. Network status page created. Web API created (beta). Update for manual and languages. Misc. other bugfixes incl. bugfixes for crashes.
This is a maintenance update. Improved networking I/O. Also some minor GUI updates. Misc. other fixes including bugfixes for crashes.

Game-play balancing improved, i.e. new happiness modifier added that is applied every turn to circumvent "Fake Wars" and "Ganging". Wall posts can now be pinned. Icon indicating if a player is in a clan or not. Improved and fixed network connectivity resulting in higher speeds and less errors. GUI contrast improved. Misc. other bugfixes incl. bugfixes for crashes.

Maintenance release: the '-' wasn't showing anymore due to changing to the proper Unicode character but not updating the bitmap font sheet (basically invisible). Misc. other minor bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Maintenance release: improve boot up speed of application. Rankings now contains clan buttons again. Latest translations added. Misc. bugfixes incl. bugfixes for crashes.

Balancing for attacking far away nations, i.e. happiness penalty applied. Helps sea nations. Initial penalty for declarations of war reduced. Application boot up improved. Incognito games now hide player name in chat. Misc. fixes including bugfixes for crashes.
AI runs faster. Fair-Play policy updated (in-game guide). Latest translations added. Maintenance including bugfixes for crashes (especially during startup).
AI runs faster. Fair-Play policy updated (in-game guide). Latest translations added. Maintenance including bugfixes for crashes (especially during startup).
Clan rankings added. UI bugfixes. Misc. other bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Clan rankings added. UI bugfixes. Misc. other bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Clan rankings added. UI bugfixes. Misc. other bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Bugfix for buttons not pushable for certain languages (e.g. Dutch). Layouting problems preventing the buttons to be clicked.

Internal code cleanup and performance improvements. Minor UI updates. Bugfixes including bugfixes for crashes.

Networking updated incl. chat synchronization. The chat system now has a players vs. chess-engine mode (multiplayer). Translations and glyphs updated. Misc. fixes including bugfixes for crashes.
Networking updated incl. chat synchronization. The chat system now has a players vs. chess-engine mode (multiplayer). Translations and glyphs updated. Misc. fixes including bugfixes for crashes.

Improvement for multiplayer and networking. Bugfixes for user interface, performance and misc. bugfixes incl. bugfixes for crashes.
